alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Dallas; Lowndes; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 1:26PM CDT until August 08 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Autauga County in central Alabama... Lowndes County in south central Alabama... Southeastern Dallas County in south central Alabama... Southwestern Montgomery County in south central Alabama... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 126 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Benton to near Lowndes County Airport, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Montgomery, Prattville, Fort Deposit, Mosses, Hayneville, White Hall, Gordonville, Lowndesboro, Benton, Beechwood, Tyler, Grady, Sellers, Davenport, Ramer, Pintlala, Lowndes County Airport, Strata, Naftel and Hope Hull. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
